thread.section_title: Snowcountry Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Snowcountry | snowcountry.eu
thread.title: Wadders

author: Wadders
title: Wadders
text:
Ordered some new skis and bindings from Snowcountry on a Monday night after their shipping time of 16:30. Not only had they fitted the bindings by Tuesday but they had also shipped them. All tracking information was sent through immediately after shipping. Got them delivered to a very rural address in the UK on Thursday in perfect condition and exactly as expected.
All in all a very fast, effective, and professional website. Would go back here in a heart beat and wouldn't hesitate to recommend!
